17 #define HWPL_TEST_BIT(x,y) (x & (1<<y))
18 #define HWPL_SET_BIT(x,y) (x |= (1<<y))
19 #define HWPL_SET_MASK(x,y) (x |= y)
20 #define HWPL_CLR_BIT(x,y) (x &= ~(1<<y))
21 #define HWPL_CLR_MASK(x,y) (x &= ~y)

107 typedef struct {

110  hwpl_callback_t callback ;
111  void * context ;

117 typedef enum {
118  HWPL_SIGCODE_OP_COMPLETE = (1<<0),
119  HWPL_SIGCODE_NEW_DATA = (1<<1),
120  HWPL_SIGCODE_EVENT = (1<<2)
121 } hwpl_sigcode_bitmask_t;
